classes.subject: SCM
classes.title: Logistics and Transportation Management
classes.description: Prerequisites: MKT 304 (Marketing majors just attain a grade ofC or higher); Upper Division Writing Proficiency Exam (UDWPE) score of 8 or higher. BUS 302/L are prerequisites for Business majors. Introduction to the management of firms that market transportation services; the managerial implications of the legal economic and social environment. (Crosslisted with MKT 447)
